body:
Avicus had 2 big updates, before and after these two nothing has really happened . I think there should be more small updates instead of putting them all together to make one big update.
There would be less complaints and you don't have to worry about a name for the update because you don't need one! How good does that sound? Not having to rename one update twice! It would also be less stressful for the developers.One small update per month is enough.

i cant really explain it very well cus im no english masterino

o/

title: [SUG] More updates,  less big

replies.body: it would also be easier to find and fix bugs if you do small updates

replies.body: true, i totally forgot about it t-t

replies.body: That's a great idea, and one of my intentions of bringing in a new developer. In addition, I've been learning how to program since day one of MC Zone so it has been necessary to redesign plugins for efficiency and organization as I learn.
